alert.note: Alert for Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 2:14PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hidalgo County through 245 PM CDT... At 214 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Pharr Elementary School, or near Hidalgo, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pharr, Weslaco, San Juan, Alamo, Donna, Hidalgo, South McAllen, Austin Middle School, South Pharr Elementary School and Buckner Elementary School. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
